cause.description:
We are a small group of volunteers who have a heart for the kids in africa. WE work hard to save their little lives. WE have 2 homes rightn ow and we are opening a 3rd one in North Ghana soon. WE have the home run like a family and the kids are so blessed. WE have mommys and daddys like you guys who sponsor them . All $30 goes to the child. WE give you the phone number of the home and you can call every day if you weant. we send pics every week. WE even just got a computer, webcam so we can all talk and see the kids. It is so awesome. Please consider taking on a child. WE are even applying to open an international adoption agency. You could help us fund raise too. every $1 goes a long way. You Must see our site and then you can donate or offer to help on the site . It is www.handsmercy.com. Please go there now.Be blessed Guys
1. we must help save thelives of these dying kids in Africa
2. are you interested in international adoptions from Ghana?
3. Talk to your african child daily if you choose
